review: Hello,I am Lalita Arora and was admitted in BLK hospital for severe dehydration.I was under observation of Dr Deepak Gargi Pandey.He is such a nice and affectionate doctor,I got so much impressed with him.He explains each and every thing to the patient.He is very friendly with his patients.Highly recommended Physician .I salute him.
Superb talented doctor n very gud human being seriously hats off ur patience n ur work. Thank for helping us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Identifies symptoms correctly,  treats well, I am satisfied and recommend others for him. Efficient    
Doctor, good communication
